Original: 是一個下午就開的酒吧咖啡廳，裡面走清水模的簡約風，空間和桌椅都非常舒服，氛圍也輕鬆自在，調酒師/店員也不會有過度的打擾但又很友善。調酒兼具口感和創意，忘了是點跌停板還是漲停板，但是桂花加在裡面蠻有趣的，整體都很好喝，酒感也都有，是一個非常有質感跟適合和少數朋友聊天的質感酒吧，也適合讀書跟用用電腦打發時間的地方，但是因為是約傍晚的時候來，所以不知道晚上的氣氛是不是會有不同。下次希望可以再來訪試試其他品項！
EN: It is a bar coffee shop opened in the afternoon. The simple style of water modeling is taken in it. The space and tables and chairs are very comfortable, the atmosphere is easy, and the bartender/clerk will not have excessive disturbance but very friendly.The bartending has a sense of mouth and creativity. Forget whether it is a daily limit or a daily limit board, but the osmanthus is quite interesting in it, the overall is delicious, and the wine feels. Bar is also suitable for reading and using a computer to pass the time, but because it comes in the evening, I don't know if the atmosphere at night will be different.Next time I hope to visit other items again!

Original:
是一間有供應調酒的咖啡廳，因此下午就能在這喝到酒飲
調酒的路線以經典品項為主，少數幾樣是特製的調酒
但這邊飲品為主，甜點選項就比較沒那麼豐富
空間則是相當舒適、寬敞，有點中西式合璧的傢俱元素，滿有特色，並且可以看到老闆自己一些興趣擺設

飲品我個人認為都是有 80 分以上的水準，不到超頂尖，但都有達到相當的水準
經典調酒的呈現算忠於原味的路線，調製起來順口好喝，保留住酒感，但自然不刺激，該有的表現大致有出來
咖啡一樣在味道表現也及格，沖泡的韻味讓人喜歡
但咖啡和酒飲一樣，層次變化稍微沒那麼豐富，如果有的話應該會再更喜歡一些
EN:
It is a coffee shop with bartender, so you can drink it here in the afternoon
The route of bartending is mainly classic items. A few are specially made bartender
But the beverages here are mainly, the dessert option is less rich
The space is quite comfortable and spacious, a bit of Chinese and Western -style furniture elements, full of characteristics, and you can see

I personally think that the drinks have a level of 80 or more.
The presentation of the classic bartending is a loyalty line, the modulation is delicious and delicious, and the wine feels, but it is naturally not stimulated.
The taste of coffee is also inaccuated, and the flavor of brewing makes people like
But coffee is the same as wine, and the layers of changes are not so rich. If so, you should prefer more
